edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.model

Class GameRequirementModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.AbstractModel
      • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.model.GameRequirementModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.Model

    public class GameRequirementModel
extends edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.AbstractModel
    A simplified requirement model for a planning poker game
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team 9

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameRequirementModel()
      Creates a new GameRequirementModel with all blank fields.
      GameRequirementModel(int parentId, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String type)
      Creates a new GameRequirementModel with no estimates made so far.
      GameRequirementModel(int parentId, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String type, java.util.ArrayList<Estimate> estimates)
      Creates a new GameRequirementModel.
      The list of estimates passed in is sorted.
      GameRequirementModel(edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.requirementmanager.models.Requirement r)
      Creates a new GameRequirementModel from a requirement from RequirementManager.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEstimate(Estimate e)
      Adds an estimate to the list of estimates for this requirement.
      This method also sorts the list of estimates after adding an estimate, so the list is always kept sorted.

      Gets the final estimate made for this requirement.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameRequirementModel

        public GameRequirementModel(int parentId,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    java.lang.String type,
                    java.util.ArrayList<Estimate> estimates)
        Creates a new GameRequirementModel.
        The list of estimates passed in is sorted.
        Parameters:
        parentId - the ID number of this requirement's parent requirement in requirements manager
        name - the name of the requirement
        description - the requirement's description
        type - the type of requirement
        estimates - the list of estimates that have been made so far for this requirement

      • GameRequirementModel

        public GameRequirementModel(int parentId,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    java.lang.String type)
        Creates a new GameRequirementModel with no estimates made so far.
        Parameters:
        parentId - the ID number of this requirement's parent requirement in requirements manager
        name - the name of the requirement
        description - the requirement's description
        type - the type of requirement

      • GameRequirementModel

        public GameRequirementModel()
        Creates a new GameRequirementModel with all blank fields. This constructor should not generally be used except in database queries.

      • GameRequirementModel

        public GameRequirementModel(edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.requirementmanager.models.Requirement r)
        Creates a new GameRequirementModel from a requirement from RequirementManager.
        Parameters:
        r - the Requirement to model this GameRequirementModel off of
